entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few rain showers and flurries beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
